snippet: Running back David Wilson, a 2012 first-round draft pick from Virginia Tech, expects to be a starter at some point, though he realizes it will take time.
abstract: New York Giants rookie running back David Wilson, a 2012 first-round draft pick, is showing grit and speed in training camp; expects to be a starter at some point, but realizes it will take time.
lead_paragraph: Running back David Wilson, a 2012 first-round draft pick from Virginia Tech, expects to be a starter at some point, though he realizes it will take time.

headline.seo: Giants’ Top Draft Pick David Wilson Is Eager to Contribute
headline.main: The Giants’ Top Pick Shows Grit and Speed
headline.print_headline: The Giants’ Top Pick Shows Grit And Speed
